item.title: Turkey State Lenders Return to Lira's Defense After Sharp Drop
item.description: The Turkish lira recovered some ground on Thursday after the government intervened in the market to sell dollars. The lira had fallen to a record low against the US dollar on Wednesday, after the government suspended a program that allowed state lenders to sell dollars to support the currency.
